title: How to Make Kacang Merah Ice (Red Bean Ice)

steps.headline: Rinse and drain the red beans until clean.
Steam the red beans with sugar in the pressure cooker for approximately 30 minutes.
While the red beans steam, heat the chopped brown sugar with 50 ml of water and heat coconut milk.
steps.description: Stir it well and remove until boiling.

steps.headline: Chill the mixture and fill half of your glass with red beans.
Add 6 tablespoons of brown sugar, 2 tablespoons of coconut milk and ice cubes.
Top with avocado, syrup, milk and extra red beans.
Finally, serve your Kacang Merah Ice.

text: Rinse and drain the red beans until clean.  Steam the red beans with sugar in the pressure cooker for approximately 30 minutes.  While the red beans steam, heat the chopped brown sugar with 50 ml of water and heat coconut milk. Stir it well and remove until boiling. Chill the mixture and fill half of your glass with red beans.  Add 6 tablespoons of brown sugar, 2 tablespoons of coconut milk and ice cubes.  Top with avocado, syrup, milk and extra red beans.  Finally, serve your Kacang Merah Ice.
